languages.text:
Ульфар — Космический волк, могучий космодесантник. Его размеры внушают уважение союзникам и страх врагам, но из-за того, что Ульфар занимает 4 клетки вместо 1, некоторые навыки могут работать иначе.
Ульфар не пользуется укрытиями и обычными человеческими броней и оружием.
Уникальная особенность Ульфара позволяет ему один раз за бой вместо потери сознания от снижения здоровья до 0 становиться неактивным на 2 раунда.
Пока Ульфар находится в таком состоянии, он не может быть целью атак и получать урон, а также считается полным укрытием для своих союзников.
По истечении двух раундов Ульфар снова становится активен и восстанавливает 50% от максимального здоровья.
Также Ульфар является архмилитантом. Ключевая пассивная способность архмилитанта позволяет ему получать уровни эффекта "универсальность" каждый раз, когда он использует атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей.
Типами атак в данном контексте являются: одиночный выстрел, рукопашная атака (одиночная или очередью), рукопашная атака по области, дистанционная атака по области, выстрел очередью.
За каждый уровень эффекта "универсальность" архмилитант получает +5 к Ближнему Бою и Дальнему Бою.
Если архмилитант накапливает 4 или больше уровней эффекта "универсальность", то его атаки начинают наносить +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ББ архмилитанта)</u>% или +<u>(3 × бонус ДБ архмилитанта)</u>% урона дополнительно (в зависимости от того, какое значение выше).

traits.locale_text:
Ульфар — Космический волк, могучий космодесантник. Его размеры внушают уважение союзникам и страх врагам, но из-за того, что Ульфар занимает 4 клетки вместо 1, некоторые навыки могут работать иначе.
Ульфар не пользуется укрытиями и обычными человеческими броней и оружием.
Уникальная особенность Ульфара позволяет ему один раз за бой вместо потери сознания от снижения здоровья до 0 становиться неактивным на 2 раунда.
Пока Ульфар находится в таком состоянии, он не может быть целью атак и получать урон, а также считается полным укрытием для своих союзников.
По истечении двух раундов Ульфар снова становится активен и восстанавливает 50% очков здоровья.
Также Ульфар является Ветераном. Ключевая пассивная способность ветерана позволяет ему получать очки Правильного инструмента каждый раз, когда он использует атаку, тип которой отличается от типа предыдущей атаки ветерана.
Типами атак в данном контексте являются: одиночный выстрел, одиночный рукопашный удар, рукопашная атака по области, дистанционная атака по области, выстрел очередью.
За каждое очко Правильного инструмента ветеран получает +5 к Ближнему Бою и Дальнему Бою.
Если ветеран накапливает 4 или больше очков Правильного инструмента, то его атаки начинают наносить дополнительный урон в объеме, равном наивысшему из параметров ветерана — Бонус Ближнего Боя/2 или Бонус Дальнего Боя/2.

languages.text:
Ulfar is a Space Wolf, a mighty Space Marine. His proportions instil respect in his allies and fear in his foes, but because Ulfar takes up 4 cells instead of 1, certain mechanics may work differently for him.
Ulfar does not use {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} or conventional human armour and weapons.
Ulfar's unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him, once per combat, instead of losing consciousness due to having his {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reduced to 0, to become incapacitated for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
Furthermore, Ulfar is an Arch-Militant. An Arch-Militant's keystone ability allows them to gain a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Arch-Militant used.
For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack.
For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5.
If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's BS bonus)</u>% damage (whichever is greater).

Типами атак в данном контексте являются: одиночный выстрел, одиночный рукопашный удар, рукопашная атака по области, дистанционная атака по области, выстрел очередью.

traits.locale_text:
Ulfar is a Space Wolf, a mighty Space Marine. His proportions instil respect in his allies and fear in his foes, but because Ulfar takes up 4 cells instead of 1, certain mechanics may work differently for him.
Ulfar does not use cover or conventional human armour and weapons.
Ulfar's unique ability allows him, once per combat, instead of losing consciousness due to having his wounds reduced to 0, become incapacitated for 2 rounds.
While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his maximum wounds.
Furthermore, Ulfar is a Veteran. A Veteran's keystone ability allows them to gain a stack of right tool for the job each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Veteran used.
For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: single shot, single melee attack, area melee attack, area ranged attack, and burst attack.
For each stack of this effect on the Veteran, their Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill are increased by +5.
If the Veteran accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing additional damage equal to their Weapon Skill bonus / 2 or their Ballistic Skill / 2 (whichever is greater).

Ulfar does not use cover or conventional human armour and weapons.
Ulfar's unique ability allows him, once per combat, instead of losing consciousness due to having his wounds reduced to 0, become incapacitated for 2 rounds.
While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his maximum wounds.
Furthermore, Ulfar is a Veteran. A Veteran's keystone ability allows them to gain a stack of right tool for the job each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Veteran used.
For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: single shot, single melee attack, area melee attack, area ranged attack, and burst attack.
For each stack of this effect on the Veteran, their Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill are increased by +5.
If the Veteran accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing additional damage equal to their Weapon Skill bonus / 2 or their Ballistic Skill / 2 (whichever is greater).

Ulfar is a Space Wolf, a mighty Space Marine. His proportions instil respect in his allies and fear in his foes, but because Ulfar takes up 4 cells instead of 1, certain mechanics may work differently for him.
Ulfar does not use cover or conventional human armour and weapons.
Ulfar's unique ability allows him, once per combat, instead of losing consciousness due to having his wounds reduced to 0, to become incapacitated for 2 rounds.
While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his maximum wounds.
Furthermore, Ulfar is a Veteran. A Veteran's keystone ability allows them to gain a stack of right tool for the job each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Veteran used.
For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: single shot, single melee attack, area melee attack, area ranged attack, and burst attack.
For each stack of this effect on the Veteran, their Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill are increased by +5.
If the Veteran accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing additional damage equal to <u>(Veteran's WS bonus / 2)</u> or <u>(Veteran's BS bonus / 2)</u> (whichever is greater).

Ulfar is a Space Wolf, a mighty Space Marine. His proportions instil respect in his allies and fear in his foes, but because Ulfar takes up 4 cells instead of 1, certain mechanics may work differently for him.
Ulfar does not use {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} or conventional human armour and weapons.
Ulfar's unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him, once per combat, instead of losing consciousness due to having his {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reduced to 0, to become incapacitated for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
Furthermore, Ulfar is an Arch-Militant. An Arch-Militant's keystone ability allows them to gain a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Arch-Militant used.
For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack.
For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5.
If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's BS bonus)</u>% damage (whichever is greater).

languages.text:
乌尔法是位强大的星际战士，来自太空野狼军团。他硕大的身躯让他的盟友感到敬畏，让他的敌人恐惧不已。乌尔法在战斗中会占用4个格子（而非通常情况的1个格子），因此他的部分机制会比较特殊。
乌尔法无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，也无法使用人类传统的盔甲或武器。
乌尔法拥有独特的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，当他在战斗中{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0点时，他不会失去意识，而是会陷入休眠，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此能力每场战斗中只能触发一次。
在休眠状态下，乌尔法无法成为攻击目标，也不会受到伤害。此外，乌尔法还可以被他的盟友当做全身掩体使用。
两轮结束之后，乌尔法会恢复50%{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}，再次加入战斗。
此外，乌尔法还是一名首席战士。首席战士的关键被动能力：多才多艺。首席战士每次使用不同类型的攻击时，都会获得1层“多才多艺”效果。
不同的攻击类型包括：包括{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战{/g}攻击（包括单次攻击与连续攻击）、范围近战攻击、范围{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击。
首席战士每叠加1层“多才多艺”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}层数，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}就会提高5点。
当首席战士至少拥有4层“多才多艺”层数时，首席战士的所有攻击造成的伤害都会获得百分比加成，等同于<u>（3×武器技能{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%或<u>（3×弹道技能加值）</u>%，两者以较高者为准。

While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack.
For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5.
If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's BS bonus)</u>% damage (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text:
乌尔法是位强大的星际战士，来自太空野狼军团。他硕大的身躯让他的盟友感到敬畏，让他的敌人恐惧不已。乌尔法在战斗中会占用4个格子（而非通常情况的1个格子），因此他的部分机制会比较特殊。
乌尔法无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，也无法使用人类传统的盔甲或武器。
乌尔法拥有独特的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，当他在战斗中{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0点时，他不会失去意识，而是会陷入休眠，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此能力每场战斗中只能触发一次。
在休眠状态下，乌尔法无法成为攻击目标，也不会受到伤害。此外，乌尔法还可以被他的盟友当做全身掩体使用。
两轮结束之后，乌尔法会恢复50%{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}，再次加入战斗。
此外，乌尔法还是一名首席战士。首席战士的关键被动能力：多才多艺。首席战士每次使用不同类型的攻击时，都会获得1层“多才多艺”效果。
不同的攻击类型包括：{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}、单体{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}、范围近战攻击、范围{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程攻击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}攻击。
首席战士每叠加1层“多才多艺”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}层数，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}就会提高5点。
当首席战士至少拥有4层“多才多艺”层数时，首席战士的所有攻击造成的伤害都会获得百分比加成，等同于<u>（3×武器技能{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%或<u>（3×弹道技能加值）</u>%，两者以较高者为准。

乌尔法是位强大的星际战士，来自太空野狼军团。他硕大的身躯让他的盟友感到敬畏，让他的敌人恐惧不已。乌尔法在战斗中会占用4个格子，并非通常情况的1个格子，因此他的部分机制会比较特殊。
乌尔法无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，也无法使用人类传统的盔甲或武器。
乌尔法拥有独特的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，当他在战斗中{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0点时，他不会失去意识，而是会陷入休眠，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此能力每场战斗中只能触发一次。
在休眠状态下，乌尔法无法成为攻击目标，也不会受到伤害。此外，乌尔法还可以被他的盟友当做全身掩体使用。
两轮结束之后，乌尔法会恢复50%{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}，再次加入战斗。
此外，乌尔法还是一名首席战士。首席战士的关键被动能力：多才多艺，可以让首席战士每次使用不同类型的攻击时，都会获得1层“多才多艺”效果。
不同的攻击类型包括：{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}、单体{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}、范围近战攻击、范围{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}射击。
首席战士每叠加1层“多才多艺”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}层数，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}就会提高5点。
当首席战士至少拥有4层“多才多艺”层数时，首席战士的所有攻击都会造成额外伤害，等同于<u>（首席战士的武器技能{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>或<u>（首席战士的弹道技能加值/2）</u>，两者以较高者为准。

languages.text:
ウルファーはスペースウルフ、強力なスペースマリーンである。ウルファーのプロポーションは味方に尊敬を、敵に恐怖を与えるが、ウルファーは1マスではなく4マスを占有するため、仕組みによっては、作用が違う場合もある。
ウルファーは{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}や通常の人間のアーマーや武器を使わない。
戦闘中1回、ウルファーの特異{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}により、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0になり意識を失う代わりに、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、行動不能状態になる。
ウルファーはこの状態の間、攻撃のターゲットにはならず、ダメージを受けることもなく、味方のフルカバーとしてもカウントされる。
2ラウンドが経過すると、ウルファーは再び行動できるようになり、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の50%が回復する。
加えて、ウルファーはアーク・ミリタントである。アーク・ミリタントの重要なパッシブアビリティでは、アーク・ミリタントがその前に使用した攻撃とタイプの異なる攻撃を行うたびに汎用性のスタックを獲得できる。
このアビリティに関する攻撃タイプは、{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}（単体または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}）、範囲近接攻撃、範囲{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃、遠距離バースト攻撃である。
この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の各スタックごとに、アーク・ミリタントは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が+5増加する。
アーク・ミリタントがこの効果のスタックを4以上貯めている場合、アーク・ミリタントの攻撃は +<u>（3 ×アーク・ミリタントの近接攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）</u>％または<u>（3 ×アーク・ミリタントの射撃技能ボーナス）</u>％（いずれか値の高い方）の追加ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text:
Ulfar is a Space Wolf, a mighty Space Marine. His proportions instil respect in his allies and fear in his foes, but because Ulfar takes up 4 cells instead of 1, certain mechanics may work differently for him.
Ulfar does not use {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} or conventional human armour and weapons.
Ulfar's unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him, once per combat, instead of losing consciousness due to having his {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reduced to 0, to become incapacitated for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
Furthermore, Ulfar is an Arch-Militant. An Arch-Militant's keystone ability allows them to gain a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Arch-Militant used.
For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack.
For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5.
If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's BS bonus)</u>% damage (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text:
ウルファーはスペースウルフ、強力なスペースマリーンである。ウルファーのプロポーションは味方に尊敬を、敵に恐怖を与えるが、ウルファーは1マスではなく4マスを占有するため、仕組みによっては、勝手が違う場合がある。
ウルファーは{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}や通常の人間の{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}や武器を使わない。
戦闘中1回、ウルファーの特異{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}により、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}が0になり意識を失う代わりに、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、行動不能状態になる。
ウルファーはこの状態の間、攻撃のターゲットにはならず、ダメージを受けることもなく、味方のフルカバーとしてもカウントされる。
2ラウンドが経過すると、ウルファーは再び行動できるようになり、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大負傷数{/g}の50%が回復する。
さらに、ウルファーは古参である。古参の重要なアビリティにより、古参がその前に使用した攻撃とタイプの異なる攻撃を行う度、適切なツールのスタックを1つ獲得する。
このアビリティに関する攻撃タイプは、{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}、単回{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}、範囲近接攻撃、範囲{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}連射{/g}攻撃である。
古参に対するこの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の各スタックにつき、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が5増加する。
古参がこの効果のスタックを4以上ためている場合、古参の攻撃は<u>（古参のWS{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}/2）</u>または<u>（古参のBSボーナス/2）</u>（いずれか値の高い方）と同等の追加ダメージを与える。

languages.text:
Ulfar es un Lobo Espacial, un Marine Espacial poderoso. El tamaño de Ulfar infunde respeto entre sus aliados y temor entre sus enemigos, pero también hace que ocupe 4 casillas en vez de 1, por lo que algunas mecánicas son diferentes para él.
Ulfar no usa la función de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} ni armadura ni armas humanas convencionales.
Ulfar, gracias a su {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} única, en lugar de perder el conocimiento cuando sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} llegan a 0, una vez por combate queda incapacitado durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} .
En este estado, no puede ser el objetivo de ataques ni sufrir daño, y sigue actuando como cobertura total para sus aliados.
Después de los 2 asaltos, Ulfar puede volver a realizar acciones y recupera el 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}.
Además, Ulfar es Archimilitante. La capacidad clave de un Archimilitante le permite conseguir una acumulación de Versatilidad cada vez que realice un ataque cuyo tipo sea diferente al anterior que ha usado.
A efectos de esta capacidad, los tipos de ataques son: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataque de un solo disparo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} (a un objetivo o de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}) ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} en área y ataque de ráfaga a distancia.
Por cada acumulación que obtenga el Archimilitante de este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} aumentan en +5.
Si el Archimilitante obtiene 4 o más acumulaciones de este efecto, sus ataques empiezan a infligir un +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por HA del Archimilitante)</u> % o un +<u>(3 × bonificación por HP del Archimilitante)</u> % de daño adicional (usando el valor más elevado).

Ulfar is a Space Wolf, a mighty Space Marine. His proportions instil respect in his allies and fear in his foes, but because Ulfar takes up 4 cells instead of 1, certain mechanics may work differently for him.
Ulfar does not use {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} or conventional human armour and weapons.
Ulfar's unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him, once per combat, instead of losing consciousness due to having his {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reduced to 0, to become incapacitated for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
Furthermore, Ulfar is an Arch-Militant. An Arch-Militant's keystone ability allows them to gain a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Arch-Militant used.
For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack.
For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5.
If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's BS bonus)</u>% damage (whichever is greater).

Ulfar no usa la función de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} ni armadura ni armas humanas convencionales.
Ulfar, gracias a su {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} única, en lugar de perder el conocimiento cuando sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} llegan a 0, una vez por combate queda incapacitado durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} .
En este estado, no puede ser el objetivo de ataques ni sufrir daño, y sigue actuando como cobertura total para sus aliados.
Después de los 2 asaltos, Ulfar puede volver a realizar acciones y recupera el 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}.
Además, Ulfar es Archimilitante. La capacidad clave de un Archimilitante le permite conseguir una acumulación de Versatilidad cada vez que realice un ataque cuyo tipo sea diferente al anterior que ha usado.
A efectos de esta capacidad, los tipos de ataques son: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataque de un solo disparo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} a un objetivo, ataque cuerpo a cuerpo en área, ataque a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} en área y ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfaga{/g}.
Por cada acumulación que obtenga el Archimilitante de este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} aumentan en +5.
Si el Archimilitante obtiene 4 o más acumulaciones de este efecto, sus ataques empiezan a infligir un +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por HA del Archimilitante)</u> % o un +<u>(3 × bonificación por HP del Archimilitante)</u> % de daño adicional (usando el valor más elevado).

Ulfar es un Lobo Espacial, un Marine Espacial poderoso. El tamaño de Ulfar infunde respeto entre sus aliados y temor entre sus enemigos, pero también hace que ocupe 4 casillas en vez de 1, por lo que algunas mecánicas son diferentes para él.
Ulfar no usa la función de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} ni armadura ni armas humanas convencionales.
Ulfar, gracias a su {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} única, en lugar de perder el conocimiento cuando sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} llegan a 0, una vez por combate queda incapacitado durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} .
En este estado, no puede ser el objetivo de ataques ni sufrir daño, y sigue actuando como cobertura total para sus aliados.
Después de los 2 asaltos, Ulfar puede volver a realizar acciones y recupera el 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}.
Además, Ulfar es Archimilitante. La capacidad clave de un Archimilitante le permite conseguir una acumulación de Versatilidad cada vez que realice un ataque cuyo tipo sea diferente al interior que ha usado.
A efectos de esta capacidad, los tipos de ataques son: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataque de un solo disparo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} a un objetivo, ataque cuerpo a cuerpo en área, ataque a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} en área y ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfaga{/g}.
Por cada acumulación que obtenga el Archimilitante de este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} aumentan en +5.
Si el Archimilitante acumula 4 o más acumulaciones de este efecto, sus ataques causan daño adicional igual a <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por HA del Archimilitante / 2)</u> o <u>(bonificación por HP del Archimilitante / 2)</u> (dependiendo de cuál tenga un valor superior).

languages.text:
Ulfar ins ein Space Wolf, ein mächtiger Space Marine. Seine Statur flößt seinen Verbündeten Respekt und seinen Feinden Furcht ein, aber weil Ulfar 4 Zellen einnimmt, funktionieren bestimmte Mechaniken bei ihm anders.Ulfar nutzt keine {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} oder konventionelle menschliche Rüstungen und Waffen.
Mit seiner einzigartigen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann Ulfar einmal pro Kampf 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang handlungsunfähig werden, anstatt das Bewusstsein zu verlieren, wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} auf 0 sinken.
In diesem Zustand kann Ulfar nicht angegriffen werden oder Schaden erleiden, und er bietet seinen Verbündeten volle Deckung.Nach 2 Runden kann Ulfar wieder agieren und regeneriert 50 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}.
Ulfar ist überdies ein Erzmilitant. Mit seiner Grundstein-Fähigkeit erhält der Erzmilitant einen Stapel "Vielseitigkeit", wenn er einen Angriff ausführt, der sich von seinem zuletzt verwendeten Angriffstyp unterscheidet.
Für diese Fähigkeit gibt es folgende Angriffstypen: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} (Einzelziel oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g}), Flächen-Nahkampfangriff, Flächen-{g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriff und Fernkampf-Salvenangriff.
Für jeden Stapel dieses {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effektes{/g}, mit dem der Erzmilitant belegt ist, erhöht sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} um +5.
Hat der Erzmilitant 4 oder mehr Stapel dieses Effektes, verursachen seine Angriffe zusätzlich +<u>(3 × WF-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Erzmilitanten)</u> % oder +<u>(3 × BF-Bonus des Erzmilitanten)</u> % schaden (es gilt der höhere Wert).
languages.original_text:
Ulfar is a Space Wolf, a mighty Space Marine. His proportions instil respect in his allies and fear in his foes, but because Ulfar takes up 4 cells instead of 1, certain mechanics may work differently for him.
Ulfar does not use {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} or conventional human armour and weapons.
Ulfar's unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him, once per combat, instead of losing consciousness due to having his {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reduced to 0, to become incapacitated for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
Furthermore, Ulfar is an Arch-Militant. An Arch-Militant's keystone ability allows them to gain a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Arch-Militant used.
For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack.
For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5.
If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's BS bonus)</u>% damage (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text:
Ulfar ist ein Space Wolf, ein mächtiger Space Marine. Seine Ausmaße flößen seinen Verbündeten Respekt und seinen Feinden Furcht ein, aber da Ulfar 4 statt 1 Feld einnimmt, können bestimmte Mechaniken bei ihm anders funktionieren.
Ulfar benutzt weder {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} noch herkömmliche {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}menschliche{/g} Rüstungen und Waffen.
Ulfars einzigartige {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} ermöglicht es ihm einmal pro Kampf, für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} bewegungsunfähig zu werden, anstatt das Bewusstsein zu verlieren, weil seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} auf 0 reduziert werden.
In diesem Zustand kann Ulfar nicht angegriffen werden oder Schaden erleiden, und er bietet seinen Verbündeten volle Deckung.
Sobald 2 Runden vergangen sind, kann Ulfar wieder in den Kampf eingreifen und erhält 50 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} zurück.
Ulfar ist darüber hinaus ein Veteran. Die Grundstein-Fähigkeit eines Veteranen ermöglicht ihm jedes Mal, wenn er einen Angriff ausführt, dessen Typ sich von dem unterscheidet, den der Veteran zuvor benutzt hat, Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job aufaddiert zu bekommen.
Für die Zwecke dieser Fähigkeit sind folgende Angriffsarten möglich: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}, einzelner {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Flächen-Fernkampfangriff{g|Encyclopedia:Range} und {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Salvenangriff{/g}.
Für jede Addition dieses {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} auf den Veteranen werden seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} um +5 erhöht.
Wenn der Veteran 4 oder mehr Einheiten dieses Effekts hinzuaddiert bekommt, verursachen seine Angriffe zusätzlichen Schaden in Höhe von <u>(WF-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Veteranen /2)</u> oder <u>(BF-Bonus des Veteranen /2)</u> (je nachdem, welcher Wert höher ist).

Ulfar ist ein Space Wolf, ein mächtiger Space Marine. Seine Ausmaße flößen seinen Verbündeten Respekt und seinen Feinden Furcht ein, aber da Ulfar 4 Felder statt 1 einnimmt, können bestimmte Mechaniken bei ihm anders funktionieren.
Ulfar benutzt weder {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} noch herkömmliche menschliche Rüstungen und Waffen.
Ulfars einzigartige {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} ermöglicht es ihm einmal pro Kampf, für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} handlungsunfähig zu werden, anstatt das Bewusstsein zu verlieren, weil seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} auf 0 reduziert werden.
In diesem Zustand kann Ulfar nicht angegriffen werden oder Schaden erleiden, und er bietet seinen Verbündeten volle Deckung.
Sobald 2 Runden vergangen sind, kann Ulfar wieder in den Kampf eingreifen und erhält 50 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} zurück.
Ulfar ist darüber hinaus ein Erzmilitant. Die Grundsteinfähigkeit eines Erzmilitanten ermöglicht ihm jedes Mal, wenn er einen Angriff ausführt, dessen Typ sich von dem unterscheidet, den der Erzmilitant zuvor benutzt hat, einen Stapel Vielseitigkeit zu bekommen.
Für die Zwecke dieser Fähigkeit sind folgende Angriffsarten möglich: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}, einzelner {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, Flächen-Nahkampfangriff, Flächen-{g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Angriff und {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Salven{/g}-Angriff.
Für jeden Stapel dieses {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} auf den Erzmilitanten werden seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} um +5 erhöht.
Wenn der Erzmilitant 4 oder mehr Stapel dieses Effekts ansammelt, verursachen seine Angriffe zusätzlichen Schaden in Höhe von <u>(WF-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Erzmilitanten / 2)</u> oder <u>(BF-Bonus des Veteranen / 2)</u> (je nachdem, welcher Wert höher ist).

languages.text:
Ulfar est un Space Wolf, un puissant Space Marine. Si son gabarit suscite le respect de ses alliés et la crainte de ses ennemis, ce personnage occupant 4 cases au lieu d'une seule, certains mécanismes peuvent fonctionner différemment pour lui.
Il n'utilise pas de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} ni d'armes et d'armure humaines conventionnelles.
Une fois par combat, si sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est réduite à 0, sa {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} unique lui permet d'être immobilisé pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} au lieu de perdre connaissance.
Lorsqu'il est dans cet état, Ulfar ne peut ni être pris pour cible ni subir de dégâts, et il continue de couvrir ses alliés.
Au terme de ces 2 rounds, il peut à nouveau agir et récupère 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}.
Par ailleurs, Ulfar étant un archimilitant, sa capacité clé lui confère un cumul de Polyvalence chaque fois qu'il lance une attaque d'un type différent de celui de l'attaque précédente.
Pour les besoins de cette capacité, les types d'attaques sont les suivants : attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g}, attaque de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}mêlée{/g} (cible unique ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}), attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et attaque en rafale à distance.
Pour chaque cumul de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} obtenu par l'archimilitant, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g} augmentent de +5.
Si le personnage possède au moins 4 cumuls de cet effet, ses attaques infligent +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de CA de l'archimilitant)</u> % ou +<u>(3 × bonus de CB de l'archimilitant)</u> % de dégâts supplémentaires (selon la valeur la plus élevée).
languages.original_text:

Ulfar does not use {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} or conventional human armour and weapons.
Ulfar's unique {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him, once per combat, instead of losing consciousness due to having his {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reduced to 0, to become incapacitated for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
While in this state, Ulfar cannot be targeted by attacks or suffer damage, and he also counts as full cover for his allies.
Once 2 rounds have passed, Ulfar can act again and regains 50% of his {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
Furthermore, Ulfar is an Arch-Militant. An Arch-Militant's keystone ability allows them to gain a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Arch-Militant used.
For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack.
For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5.
If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(3 × Arch-Militant's BS bonus)</u>% damage (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text:
Ulfar est un Space Wolf, un puissant Space Marine. Si son gabarit suscite le respect de ses alliés et la crainte de ses ennemis, ce personnage occupant 4 cases au lieu d'une seule, certains mécanismes peuvent fonctionner différemment pour lui.
Il n'utilise pas de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} ni d'armes et d'armure humaines conventionnelles.
Une fois par combat, si sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est réduite à 0, sa {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} unique lui permet d'être immobilisé pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} au lieu de perdre connaissance.
Lorsqu'il est dans cet état, Ulfar ne peut ni être pris pour cible ni subir de dégâts, et il continue de couvrir ses alliés.
Au terme de ces 2 rounds, il peut à nouveau agir et récupère 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}.
Par ailleurs, Ulfar étant un archimilitant, sa capacité clé lui confère un cumul de Polyvalence chaque fois qu'il lance une attaque d'un type différent de celui de l'attaque précédente.
Pour les besoins de cette capacité, les types d'attaques sont les suivants : {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}attaque à distance ponctuelle{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} ponctuelle, attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}rafale{/g}.
Pour chaque cumul de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} obtenu par l'archimilitant, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g} augmentent de +5.
Si le personnage possède au moins 4 cumuls de cet effet, ses attaques infligent +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de CA de l'archimilitant)</u> % ou +<u>(3 × bonus de CB de l'archimilitant)</u> % de dégâts supplémentaires (selon la valeur la plus élevée).

Ulfar est un Space Wolf, un puissant Space Marine. Ses proportions suscitent le respect de ses alliés et la crainte de ses ennemis, mais Ulfar occupant 4 cases au lieu de 1, certains mécanismes peuvent fonctionner différemment pour lui.
Ulfar n'utilise pas de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} ni d'armure ou d'armes humaines conventionnelles.
Une fois par combat, la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} unique d'Ulfar l'immobilise pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} plutôt que de lui faire perdre conscience suite à la réduction de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} à 0.
Lorsqu'il est dans cet état, Ulfar ne peut ni être pris pour cible ni subir de dégâts, et il continue de couvrir ses alliés.
Au terme de ces 2 rounds, Ulfar peut à nouveau agir et regagne 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}.
De plus, Ulfar est un archimilitant. La capacité clé d'un archimilitant lui permet de bénéficier d'un cumul de Versatilité chaque fois qu'il lance une attaque d'un type différent de celui de l'attaque précédente.
Pour les besoins de cette capacité, les types d'attaques sont les suivants : {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}attaque au coup par coup{/g} simple, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} simple, attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et attaque {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}en rafale{/g}.
Pour chaque cumul de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} sur l'archimilitant, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g} augmentent de +5.
Si l'archimilitant possède au moins 4 cumuls de cet effet, ses attaques infligent des dégâts supplémentaires de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de CC / 2)</u> ou +<u>(bonus de CT / 2)</u> (selon la valeur la plus élevée).
